caption: In a room, a small dog lies by the door, while on the other end of the room, there are three people. A blue creature squeezes under the door, teaching the small dog how to open it. The dog presses the doorknob, and the door swings open. A man and a woman are in the cockpit, with a red object outside the window. The man and woman share a kiss. On the deck, several people wield weapons that emit green flames. A man on a flying contraption crashes on the ground, pulling out a pocket watch. Two men ride red creatures in the sky. A woman enters the cockpit. A man in blue clothing arrives at an open area, surrounded by strange creatures. He holds a shovel and starts digging into the ground. Another man joins to assist. The massive vines covering the entire world begin to crumble. Everyone initially appears joyous but then turns melancholic.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(What is the style of the movie?Does it look like cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like a cartoon movie.
